verses.verse: Now Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> was a mighty man <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and he was the son <WH1121> of a prostitute: <WH802> and Gilead <WH1568> became the father <WH3205> of Jephthah. <WH3316>

Gilead <WH1568>'s wife <WH802> bore <WH3205> him sons; <WH1121> and when his wife <WH802>'s sons <WH1121> grew up, <WH1431> they drove out <WH1644> Jephthah, <WH3316> and said <WH559> to him, <WH5157> "You shall not inherit in our father <WH1>'s house; <WH1004> for you are the son <WH1121> of another <WH312> woman. <WH802>"

Then Jephthah <WH3316> fled <WH1272> from <WH6440> his brothers, <WH251> and lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Tob: <WH2897> and there were gathered <WH3950> vain <WH7386> fellows <WH582> to Jephthah, <WH3316> and they went out with him. <WH3318>
It happened after a while, <WH3117> that the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> against Israel. <WH3478>

It was so, <WH1121> that when the children of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> against Israel, <WH3478> the elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> went <WH3212> to get <WH3947> Jephthah <WH3316> out of the land <WH776> of Tob; <WH2897>
and they said <WH559> to Jephthah, <WH3316> "Come <WH3212> and be our chief, <WH7101> that we may fight <WH3898> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>"

Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> to the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> "Didn't <WH8130> you hate me, <WH1644> and drive me out of my father <WH1>'s house? <WH1004> Why have you come <WH935> to me now when you are in distress? <WH6887>"

The elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> to Jephthah, <WH3316> "Therefore we have turned again <WH7725> to you now, <WH1980> that you may go with us, <WH3898> and fight with the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983> and you shall be our head <WH7218> over all the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gilead. <WH1568>"

Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> to the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> "If you bring me home again <WH7725> to fight <WH3898> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and Yahweh <WH3068> deliver <WH5414> them before <WH6440> me, <WH7218> shall I be your head?"
The elders <WH2205> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> to Jephthah, <WH3316> "Yahweh <WH3068> shall be witness <WH8085> between us; <WH1697> surely according to your word so will we do. <WH6213>"

Then Jephthah <WH3316> went <WH3212> with the elders <WH2205> of Gilead, <WH1568> and the people <WH5971> made <WH7760> him head <WH7218> and chief <WH7101> over them: <WH3316> and Jephthah spoke <WH1696> all his words <WH1697> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> in Mizpah. <WH4709>

Jephthah <WH3316> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> saying, <WH559> "What have you to do with me, <WH935> that you have come to me to fight <WH3898> against my land? <WH776>"

The king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> answered <WH559> to the messengers <WH4397> of Jephthah, <WH3316> "Because Israel <WH3478> took away <WH3947> my land, <WH776> when he came up <WH5927> out of Egypt, <WH4714> from the Arnon <WH769> even to the Jabbok, <WH2999> and to the Jordan: <WH3383> now therefore restore that territory again <WH7725> peaceably. <WH7965>"
Jephthah <WH3316> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> again <WH3254> to the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>

and he said <WH559> to him, <WH559> "Thus says Jephthah: <WH3316> Israel <WH3478> didn't <WH3947> take away the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> nor the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983>
but when they came up <WH5927> from Egypt, <WH4714> and Israel <WH3478> went <WH3212> through the wilderness <WH4057> to the Red <WH5488> Sea, <WH3220> and came <WH935> to Kadesh; <WH6946>

then Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to the king <WH4428> of Edom, <WH123> saying, <WH559> <WH5674> 'Please let me pass through your land; <WH776>' but the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123> didn't <WH8085> listen. In the same way, <WH7971> he sent to the king <WH4428> of Moab; <WH4124> but he would <WH14> not: <WH3478> and Israel stayed <WH3427> in Kadesh. <WH6946>

Then they went through <WH3212> the wilderness, <WH4057> and went around <WH5437> the land <WH776> of Edom, <WH123> and the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> and came <WH935> by the east side <WH4217> of the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> and they encamped <WH2583> on the other side <WH5676> of the Arnon; <WH769> but they didn't <WH935> come within the border <WH1366> of Moab, <WH4124> for the Arnon <WH769> was the border <WH1366> of Moab. <WH4124>

Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon; <WH2809> and Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to him, <WH5674> 'Please let us pass through your land <WH776> to <WH5704> my place. <WH4725>'

But Sihon <WH5511> didn't <WH539> trust Israel <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> through his border; <WH1366> but Sihon <WH5511> gathered <WH622> all his people <WH5971> together, <WH622> and encamped <WH2583> in Jahaz, <WH3096> and fought <WH3898> against Israel. <WH3478>

Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> delivered <WH5414> Sihon <WH5511> and all his people <WH5971> into the hand <WH3027> of Israel, <WH3478> and they struck <WH5221> them: <WH3478> so Israel possessed <WH3423> all the land <WH776> of the Amorites, <WH567> the inhabitants <WH3427> of that country. <WH776>
They possessed <WH3423> all the border <WH1366> of the Amorites, <WH567> from the Arnon <WH769> even to the Jabbok, <WH2999> and from the wilderness <WH4057> even to the Jordan. <WH3383>

So now Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> has dispossessed <WH3423> the Amorites <WH567> from before <WH6440> his people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and should you possess them? <WH3423>

Won't <WH3423> you possess that which Chemosh <WH3645> your god <WH430> gives you to possess? <WH3423> So whoever Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> has dispossessed <WH3423> from before <WH6440> us, <WH3423> them will we possess.

Now are you anything better <WH2896> than Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor, <WH6834> king <WH4428> of Moab? <WH4124> Did he ever <WH7378> strive <WH7378> against Israel, <WH3478> or did he ever <WH7378> fight against them? <WH3898>

While Israel <WH3478> lived <WH3427> in Heshbon <WH2809> and its towns, <WH1323> and in Aroer <WH6177> and its towns, <WH1323> and in all the cities <WH5892> that are along by the side <WH3027> of the Arnon, <WH769> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> years; <WH8141> why didn't <WH5337> you recover them within that time? <WH6256>

I therefore have not sinned <WH2398> against you, <WH6213> but you do me wrong <WH7451> to war <WH3898> against me. <WH3068> Yahweh, the Judge, <WH8199> be judge <WH8199> this day <WH3117> between the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>"
However the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> didn't <WH8085> listen to the words <WH1697> of Jephthah <WH3316> which he sent him. <WH7971>

Then the Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh <WH3068> came on Jephthah, <WH3316> and he passed over <WH5674> Gilead <WH1568> and Manasseh, <WH4519> and passed over <WH5674> Mizpeh <WH4708> of Gilead, <WH1568> and from Mizpeh <WH4708> of Gilead <WH1568> he passed over <WH5674> to the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>
Jephthah <WH3316> vowed <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> "If you will indeed <WH5414> deliver <WH5414> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> into my hand, <WH3027>

then it shall be, <WH3318> that whatever comes forth <WH3318> from the doors <WH1817> of my house <WH1004> to meet <WH7125> me, <WH7725> when I return in peace <WH7965> from the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> it shall be Yahweh <WH3068>'s, and I will offer it up <WH5927> for a burnt offering. <WH5930>"
So Jephthah <WH3316> passed over <WH5674> to the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> to fight <WH3898> against them; <WH3068> and Yahweh delivered <WH5414> them into his hand. <WH3027>

He struck <WH5221> them from Aroer <WH6177> until you come <WH935> to Minnith, <WH4511> even twenty <WH6242> cities, <WH5892> and to <WH58> Abelcheramim, <WH3754> with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347> So the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were subdued <WH3665> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

Jephthah <WH3316> came <WH935> to Mizpah <WH4709> to his house; <WH1004> and behold, <WH1323> his daughter came out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him with tambourines <WH8596> and with dances: <WH4246> and she was his only child; <WH3173> besides her he had neither son <WH1121> nor <WH176> daughter. <WH1323>

It happened, <WH7200> when he saw her, <WH7167> that he tore his clothes, <WH899> and said, <WH559> "Alas, <WH162> my daughter! <WH1323> You have brought <WH3766> me very <WH3766> low, <WH3766> and you are one of those who trouble <WH5916> me; <WH6475> for I have opened my mouth <WH6310> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and I can't <WH3201> go back. <WH7725>"

She said <WH559> to him, <WH1> "My father, you have opened <WH6475> your mouth <WH6310> to Yahweh; <WH3068> do <WH6213> to me according to that which <WH834> has proceeded <WH3318> out of your mouth, <WH6310> because <WH310> Yahweh <WH3068> has taken <WH6213> vengeance <WH5360> for you on your enemies, <WH341> even on the children <WH1121> of Ammon. <WH5983>"

She said <WH559> to her father, <WH1> "Let this thing <WH1697> be done <WH6213> for me: <WH7503> let me alone two <WH8147> months, <WH2320> that I may depart <WH3212> and go down <WH3381> on the mountains, <WH2022> and bewail <WH1058> my virginity, <WH1331> I and my companions. <WH7464>"

He said, <WH559> "Go. <WH3212>" He sent her away <WH7971> for two <WH8147> months: <WH2320> and she departed, <WH3212> she and her companions, <WH7464> and mourned <WH1058> her virginity <WH1331> on the mountains. <WH2022>

It happened at the end <WH7093> of two <WH8147> months, <WH2320> that she returned <WH7725> to her father, <WH1> who did <WH6213> with her according to his vow <WH5088> which he had vowed: <WH5087> and she was a virgin. <WH3045> <WH376> It was a custom <WH2706> in Israel, <WH3478>

that the daughters <WH1323> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3212> yearly <WH3117> to celebrate <WH8567> the daughter <WH1323> of Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> four <WH702> days <WH3117> in a year. <WH8141>
